item.title: Windows Update locking up on XP when checking for updates: fixing the svchost.exe CPU usage problem
item.dc:creator: Steven Maude
item.description: How to fix the recent (2013) freezing of Windows Update on XP machines due to svchost.exe being stuck at full (100%) CPU usage.
